item.description:
Hello all - let's try this course. "Millwood Farms Golf Course is a 9-hole executive length golf course in Framingham, Massachusetts. This short layout will reward good shots and provide a fun golf outing for everyone."

I have scheduled two tee times: 1:34 and 1:44

Greens fee is $32 for 14 holes (no extras included)

Sorry there is no driving range here but there are two pitching greens from what Im told.

Please plan to get to the course by 1:20 at the very latest.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my cell phone #

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Millwood Farms Golf Course
